name: Chicken Mania
description:
The Chickens are loose!  

Control a farmer who has carrot powers, and use them to pacify the chicken rampage. The higher your score, the less crops get destroyed on the farm.  Make sure to avoid the chickens or they will bite you!

______________________________

Controls:

  • Move  -  WASD
  • Throw carrots  - Left click
  • E  -  1st Ability  (Ring Indicator)
  • Q  -  Ultimate Ability (Sparkle Indicator)
  • Tab  -  Pause

_______________________________

Thank you for viewing my game, this was a mini game project i decided to make after completing Week 2 of Unity's course Create With Code Live 2020 (Link Below) , and i gave myself 1 week to finish this game, and i hope you enjoy the result!

https://connect.unity.com/mg/other/chicken-mania-completed
